name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: God of War Kratos: A Titan in Battle Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Witness Kratos in battle, the God of War, with dynamic visuals, shortcuts, and a sleek design in this live wallpaper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Kratos in fierce combat, showcasing his power and determination.
Minimalist Design: Clean, clutter-free interface for smooth browsing.
Clock and Date: Track time and date effortlessly.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Easy links to your favorite websites.
Google Search Bar: Convenient and fast search functionality.
More Extension: Enhance your browsing experience with additional features.
